carpet.translation[0].definitions[0].def: heavy woven material for covering floors or stairs, or a piece of this material
carpet.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: All the rooms had fitted carpets  (=carpets cut to fit the shape of the rooms).
carpet.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: We need a new stair carpet.
Do you prefer rugs or a fitted carpet?
Every room in the house had thick wall-to-wall carpets.
I love hotels with plush carpets.
The thick carpet felt warm under her feet.
It was a dingy room with a threadbare carpet.
Will it cost extra to have the carpet fitted?
carpet.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to cover a floor with carpet
carpet.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The building has been carpeted throughout.
carpet.translation[1].definitions[1].def: to talk in an angry way to someone because they have done something wrong
carpet.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Top officers were carpeted for bullying younger officers.
carpet.translation[1].definitions[2].def: if leaves, flowers etc carpet the ground, they cover it in a thick layer
carpet.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The whole garden was carpeted with daffodils.
